meanings.definition: To buy goods and sell them at a higher price.
meanings.sent1: She regrates items at her store to make a profit.
meanings.sent2: He often regrates vintage items for a higher price.
meanings.sent3: The clever merchant regrates the products with a smile.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, one must learn to regrates wisely.
meanings.sent5: The art of regrating can turn a small business into a successful venture.

meanings.definition: To sell goods again at a higher price.

meanings.sent4: She always finds a way to regrates items creatively.
